name: Fiesta Americana Hermosillo

reviews.title: Feista Americana - Comfortably American
reviews.text: Like the name says, this hotel is a party for Americans. Their guest services and most of their waitstaff speak English. The rooms are comfortable and clean. The water is filtered. There is a pool, tennis courts and workout room. Also, the bar has good happy hours deals - sometimes 2 for 1. In addition, there are a few local steak houses, a coffee house and a bank within walking distance (like across the street). My three nights there for buisness were comfortable and safe.
I needed a room for the night in Hermosillo,I read the reviews here,hoped for the best and booked...really not sure what to expect...
reviews.title: Where to stay??? I read review here, booked...and had a really wonderful time!!

reviews.text: I had a VERY nice stay here at this property. The hotel is not too far from the Airport, about 15-20min. Taxi fare is on a fixed rate by zones, so from the Airport this hotel was about US$15. Upon arriving, i noticed that the staff at this property were very friendly, and accomodating. checkin was fast and smooth, My room was very clean and bright and fresh with everything in very good condition. My room was looking out the back of the hotel away from the main street, The nice view included a skyline view with very nice sunset that evening.The Bed is in great condition, as are all the furnature. I had a very nice restful sleep. Aircon/Heat is controlled by Thermostat and works great. My room was very quiet as was the hotel. I think the hotel was 1/2 full, but i did not see anyone. I ate in my room that night, and Room service that night was truly an excellent meal, moderately priced. (i thought so). Should you want to eat downstairs, there are two restaurants with different menus. Both rest had many items to choose from. There was a bar downstairs as well. There is a hotel gym that is small but did the job nicely. Internet access was for a fee, was very fast and reliable for my stay. There is a pool, but i did not use.
reviews.title: Fiesta Americana is a fine hotel!

likes.liked: — Very large and very clean standard room was a nice surprise!

reviews.title: Great Hotel
reviews.text: In the morning i had an outside appointment, & there were plenty of taxis downstairs and checkout was very fast. the ride to the airport again, was quick and easy
Overall my one day stay was just excellent and i would not hesitate for a moment to stay here again.
reviews.title: Never Again
No fiesta in Fiesta Americana
reviews.text: I'm midway through a fairly long business trip. Knowing nothing of Hermosillo, I read all the tripadvisor reviews and, with a fair amount of trepidation, made my reservation here.

My bias against this place is that it reminded me of suburban hotels in the US. It has no charm. But this probably isn't fair on my part because the town overall has that feel. Hermosillo makes me of those Arizona sprawl cities.
reviews.title: Decent place to stay

reviews.text: The hotel was fine. The Internet was fast and free. Breakfast was decent. Service was good. They immediately changed my desk chair, which didn't have a proper back support.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel for business

reviews.text: In the end, the hotel met all of my needs, and the price was good.
reviews.title: Well Rounded Business Hotel
Very nice place
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for a job related training. Hotel staff was very friendly and food was excellent. Room service in Mexico came to be my favorite as the staff is very helpful even if you dont decide what to eat they can make very good recommendations.

reviews.title: What a wonderful stay
reviews.text: I stayed on a business trip in March, 2010. The hotel is well maintained, although it is not new. Reception/check in experience went well. Staff is completely bilingual and helpful. Wireless internet for a few of 170 pesos/day is available in all rooms. Connectivity was good. Guests that participate in the hotel's loyalty program "Fiesta Rewards" receive free internet and discounts on restaurant and hotel gift shop purchases. The business center is well equipped. Staff was welcoming and helpful. Fax service, printing service, computer access is available in the business center, which is somewhat like a nice lounge. The hotel has a nice bar, an all purpose restaurant used for breakfast and other meals. The adjacent "El Rincon" restaurant in the hotel offers a variety of steaks and typical Sonoran meals at reasonable prices. Menus are available in English. The hotel has a beauty shop and tobacco shop. The hotel is of an older design, but everything worked. TV's were not flat screen but were adequate. Toiletries in the bath were better than average, with complimentary toothbrush and toothpaste and designer soaps. Maid service was unobtrusive. The hotel can be packed with business meetings and groups. A quieter hotel is the next door Fiesta Inn, operated by the same chain and catering to business guests. Airport is a 20 minute taxi ride away. Taxi ride should cost about 150-200 pesos, depending on how much you tip.

description: In one of northern Mexico's most important cities with significant economic and cultural development, the Fiesta Americana Hermosillo is part of the hotel area of Hermosillo, Sonora; very close to the most important business centers, restaurants, museums, stores and boutiques.The strategic location of this hotel in Hermosillo makes it the perfect starting point for visits to the local historic sites to discover the charm of the old missions, wonder at the beaches bathed by the Sea of Cortez, such as San Carlos, Nuevo Guaymas and Bahia de Kino, where you can savor fresh seafood.We remind you that the check-in time is from 3:00 PM (subject to space availability). The check-out time is 1:00 AM and we suggest using our express check-out service.The Fiesta Americana Hermosillo's location in Sonora’s capital city enables business travelers to quickly access the main business and leisure centers, visit Hermosillo's most important historic sites, as well as stores and boutiques. Inside, the hotel offers the perfect refuge after a day out, with its comfortable rooms designed solely and exclusively to lavish rest and relaxation on its guests.The hotel has its own way of spoiling you: while sampling the restaurant’s specialties, being seduced by the aroma of coffee, losing yourself in a friendly chat at the Lobby Bar, having a refreshing swim in the pool or enjoying a game of tennis.
